name: Run 8 Train Simulator
description: Run 8 Train Simulator a train simulator developed by Run8 Studios, a division of 3D Train Stuff, LLC. Run 8 runs on Microsoft Windows. Run 8 is known for its physics, prototypical operation environment and multiplayer capabilities allowing group from 2 - 250 to run together in the same world simulating train operations. These operations range from running road trains, local trains and yard operations to managing up to 60+ trains as a dispatcher. Users may either use a keyboard and mouse to control the simulator or opt for the use of a Raildriver from P.I. Engineering, which is supported natively.
